item.description:
Join us for dinner and drinks at a delicious Mediterranean restaurant, The Aegean. Have a fun time relaxing with friendly and interesting people and enjoying a delicious dinner. Everyone pays for their own food/drink. The Aegean has a wide variety of items on its menu and prices are reasonable. This location is across the way from the Arsenal Mall.

If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 000. Look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside entrance or at our table. Please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Dinner and Drinks at the Aegean Restaurant, Watertown
